pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Unobserved Components Models // Comprehensive analysis and forecasting of univariate time series using automatic unobserved components models and algorithms. Harvey, AC (1989) doi:10.1017/CBO9781107049994. Pedregal, DJ and Young PC (2002) doi:10.1002/9780470996430. Durbin J and Koopman SJ (2012) doi:10.1093/acprof:oso/9780199641178.001.0001.
